channel.title: Aerotest Operations Inc. (R-098)
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: Exam Rept 50-228/OL-88-01 on 880413.Exam results:of two candidates administered test,one passed & given senior reactor operator license & one failed written exam & not granted license.Master copy of test encl.
item.description: EXAMINATION REPORT, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Forwards Exam Rept 50-228/OL-88-01 of exams administered on 880413.

item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Insp rept 50-228/98-201 on 981102-05.Violations noted.Major areas inspected:on-site review of selected aspects of licensees Class II non-power reactor operation including organization & staffing & review & audit functions.
item.description: INSPECTION REPORT, NRC-GENERATED, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC (Affiliation Not Assigned)

item.title: Notice of violation from insp on 981102-05.Violation noted: several discrepancies were noted on shipping papers as listed.
item.description: NOTICE OF VIOLATION OF A REGULATION, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC (Affiliation Not Assigned)

item.title: Forwards insp rept 50-228/98-201 on 981102-05 & notice of violation.Various aspects of safety program were inspected including selective examinations of procedures & representative records & interviews with personnel.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC (Affiliation Not Assigned)

item.title: PNO-V-88-038:on 880612,earthquake occurred on Calaveras Fault within 50 miles of identified facilities.All reactors shutdown at time of earthquake.No seismic trips observed. Insp revealed no signs of damage at facilities.
item.description: PRELIMINARY NOTIFICATION OF EVENT OR OCCURRENCE (PNO,, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Forwards security plan.Plan change involves storage of irradiated & unirradiated fuel.Plan withheld (ref 10CFR2.790).
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE, VENDOR/MANUFACTURER TO NRC
item.author: AEROTEST OPERATIONS, INC.

item.title: Forwards,for presentation,certificates for DJ Willett & SL Warren in response to Commission direction,in recognition of achievement.W/o encls.

item.title: Informs of NRC interpretation of Section 10CFR50.74(a) re changes in operator or senior operator status.Requirement for notification applies in event that operator is permanently reassigned from license to non-license position.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION V)

item.title: Informs of relocation of NRR to Rockville,MD.Official mailing address still remains same & project managers have new locations & phone numbers.TS Michaels still lead project manager for facility & A Adams will serve as backup.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO PUBLIC ENTITY/CITIZEN/ORGANIZATION/MEDIA, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: PNO-V-88-044:on 880627,earthquake occurred 5 miles east of Santa Cruz,CA.Seismic instrumentation not triggered at Vallecitos,Aerotest operations or at Univ of California at Berkeley.

item.title: PNO-V-86-014:on 860331,earthquake w/magnitude of 5.3 on Richter Scale occurred approx 10 miles east of Fremont,CA.No damage observed at research reactor facilities.Rancho Seco did not feel effects of earthquake.

item.title: Lists types of applications which fall under 6-month billing process,per 840620 rev to 10CFR170, "Fees for Facilities & Matls Licenses & Other Regulatory Svcs...." Bills will be issued in Dec & June.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO VENDOR/MANUFACTURER, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF ADMINISTRATION (ADM)

item.title: Advises that presence & irradiation of explosives in reactor must be evaluated due to potential for damage to reactor. Evaluation requested establishing operating restrictions,max quantity of explosives allowed in facility & form.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: US ATOMIC ENERGY COMMISSION (AEC)
